Inline Skates.name: Inline Skates
Inline Skates.description: They're roller skates baby! Increases moment by 4 m/yds when using the Run Action, though stopping the use of any options in the user's legs. May cause physical tasks to be done at -2.

Skateboard.name: Skateboard
Skateboard.description: The coolest wheels around. Increases moment by 4 m/yds when using the Run Action on level or downwards ground. May cause physical tasks to be done at -2.

Bottle Dynamo.name: Bottle Dynamo
Bottle Dynamo.description: A dynamo on your bike's wheel for converting mechanical energy into electricity. Charges a battery pack (such as for weapons) in one hour.

Bulletproof Glass.name: Bulletproof Glass
Bulletproof Glass.description:
Enclosure glass gains 7 HP.

Bike first requires the Enclosure upgrade to install this upgrade.

Cycle Armor.name: Cycle Armor
Cycle Armor.description:
Bicycle Armored with 7 PS.

Bike first requires the Reinforced Frame upgrade to install this upgrade.

Electric Pedal Assist.name: Electric Pedal Assist
Electric Pedal Assist.description:
Electric motorised system helping to pedal, increasing speed, lowering tiredness.

Up to next BODY level speed narrative speed, or +5MPH (8KPH) if rider is already at the top tier.

Rider get +4 bonus to Endurance Checks when riding.

Enclosure.name: Enclosure
Enclosure.description:
The bike becomes a trike with a covering body of fiberglass and plastic.

Can't install this Upgrade with the Folding Frame upgrade.

Extended Seat.name: Extended Seat
Extended Seat.description: An elongated saddle, gaining a seat for a passenger.

Folding Frame.name: Folding Frame
Folding Frame.description:
You can now fold your bike to the size of a large suitcase for easier transport and storage.

Can't install this Upgrade with Enclosure, Reinforced Frame, or Smuggling Compartment upgrades.

Gun Mount.name: Gun Mount
Gun Mount.description:
A system to attach an Assault Rifle, a Heavy SMG or a Shotgun on the handlebars, along with a firing button.

Shoots only forwards.

Mounting and detaching requires one Action.

Neon Lightning.name: Neon Lightning
Neon Lightning.description:
Fiber-optic lights on bike's frame and wheels.

Considered as a Light Tattoo when on or near the bike (gaining +2 Wardrobe & Style bonus)

Reinforced Frame.name: Reinforced Frame
Reinforced Frame.description:
Bike is now more resistant: +5 SDP and rider can be BODY 11 or more.

Can't install this Upgrade with Folding Frame Upgrade.

Security System.name: Security System
Security System.description:
Linked with your Agent to electrify your bike. A thief must resist DV13 Resist Torture/Drugs or unhand the bike.

Bike is registered with a Nano-VIN.

Smuggling Compartment.name: Smuggling Compartment
Smuggling Compartment.description:
Adds a small hidden storage space in the frame.

1 inch x 6 inches (2.54cm x 15.24cm)

DV17 Conceal/Reveal Object check to discover.

Can't install this Upgrade with Folding Frame.

Stunt Frame.name: Stunt Frame
Stunt Frame.description:
The bike loses weight and gains maneuverability.

Rider obtain a +2 bonus to Athletics skill checks when riding and doing maneuvers.

Trailer.name: Trailer
Trailer.description:
Hook with a small cargo trailer.

5 feet x 1.5 feet (1.5m x 0.46m).

An action is needed to attach and detach the trailer.

Bicycle.name: Bicycle
Bicycle.description:
A simple bicycle. It's speed is based on the riders BODY.

Body  Speed (Combat) Speed (Narative)
<4 8 MOVE 19 KPH / 12 MPH
4 - 7 10 MOVE 32 KPH / 20 MPH
8+ 15 MOVE

48 KPH / 30 MPH
  • Riders with a BODY > 10 require a Reinforced Frame Upgrade
  • Byicles use the Athletics Skill
  • Manual control only
  • Getting on a bicyle does not move you to the top of the Initiative queue
  • Ramming damage is 3d6 with the rider being thrown from the bike and suffering the Whiplash Critical Injury
  • Defenders cannot land on the bike when dodging
